BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISWCA_CAN_INDENT_GEN_TRN( GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_INDENT_NO ,DT_INDENT_DATE, NUM_CANT_ID ,STR_SHIFT,STR_INDENTER_NAME ,STR_STATUS , GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_DIET_PREP_TRN SET STR_STATUS=2 WHERE DT_FOR_PREPARATION=? AND NUM_CANT_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_DIET_PREP_DTL SET STR_STATUS=2 WHERE DT_FOR_PREPARATION=? AND NUM_CANT_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_INDENT_GEN_TRN SET DT_INDENT_DATE=?, NUM_CANT_ID=?, STR_SHIFT=? ,STR_INDENTER_NAME=?, STR_STATUS=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_INDENT_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM PISWCA_CAN_INDENT_GEN_DTL WHERE STR_INDENT_NO=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PISWCA_CAN_INDENT_GEN_DTL(GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, STR_INDENT_NO ,DT_INDENT_DATE, NUM_INGREDIENT_ITEM_ID, NUM_QTY_INDENTED, STR_REMARKS, STR_STATUS, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_INDENT_GEN_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_INDENT_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_INDENT_GEN_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_INDENT_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
